name: Pipe Monsters
description:
∞ ABOUT PIPE MONSTERS ∞

The Monsters is attacking the house by going through the Pipe.
Hurry up and use some cleaning spray to get the monsters to explode!

∞ GAMEPLAY ∞

Select one of the available Cleaning sprays and click on a Monster to hurt it until it finally explodes.
When the monster explodes it shots out some cleanser on the monsters nearby.
The goal is to get all the monsters away so you complete the level, but be careful so you don't run out cleaning spray!

Don't forget to follow Pipe_Monsters on Instagram to see the latest news and the leaderboards.

HAVE FUN!
